metadata.title: USN-4493-1 -- cryptsetup vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that cryptsetup incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4493-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  cryptsetup - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 libcryptsetup12-udeb - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 cryptsetup-run - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 libcryptsetup12 - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 libcryptsetup-dev - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 cryptsetup-udeb - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 cryptsetup-bin - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 cryptsetup-initramfs - 2:2.2.2-3ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
